info.name: Computer Shop API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Computer Shop e-commerce application (Like StarTech, Ryans). Built with Laravel 12.

## Base URL
- Local: http://localhost:8000/api/v1
- Production: {{baseUrl}}/api/v1

## Authentication
This API uses Laravel Sanctum for authentication. After login, you'll receive a Bearer token that should be included in the Authorization header for protected routes.

## Default Test Users
- Admin: admin@computerstore.com / password
- Customer: rahim@example.com / password

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new customer account.

Login to get authentication token.

Default users:
- Admin: admin@computerstore.com / password
- Customer: rahim@example.com / password
Request a password reset link.
Reset password using the token received via email.
Get the currently authenticated user's information.
Refresh the authentication token.
Logout and invalidate the current token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and password management.

request.description: Get the current user's profile information.

header.description: Optional session ID for guest carts

request.description: Get the current user's cart or guest cart. Use X-Session-Id header for guest carts.

header.description: Optional session ID for guest carts

item.description: Shopping cart endpoints. Works for both authenticated users and guests.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, confirmed, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled

Create an order from the current cart.
Get details of a specific order by ID.

Get paginated list of brands for admin.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "New Product",
    "slug": "new-product",
    "sku": "PROD-001",
    "category_id": 1,
    "brand_id": 1,
    "short_description": "Short description",
    "description": "Full product description",
    "price": 9999.00,
    "compare_price": 12999.00,
    "cost_price": 7999.00,
    "quantity": 100,
    "low_stock_threshold": 10,
    "weight": 500,
    "is_active": true,
    "is_featured": false
}
